Articles.Content:
I am looking for a Modeler to help with making some of the mods for the KerbCo. i am still trying to learn how to model and generate colliders. In every mod released and every update to that mod the modeler, script write , etc will be credited for his/her work.

KerbCo President

What kind of models? I can most likely help, now that I have some free time.

I can't texture for [self-censored], just throwing that out there.

I can make .cfg files.

thanks star whip for the reply (and the very good signature) , mostly models of engines right now, i can texture the parts and write .cfg files as well would you take up the offer you are the only one who posted?

edit1: spoke to early you might just have a teammate if you and him accept.

Edited June 13, 2014 by KerbCo
spoke early
